content.rendered:
School

CALL FOR SUMMER SCHOOL


Semantic Web and Data Stream Summer School (IWSW 2021)

Villa Clara, Cuba. June 13-14, 2022

Meliá las Dunas-North Cayeria-Cuba


In conjunction with IWSW 2022

http://www.kgswc.org/iwsw-2021/



The Central University Marta Abreu de Las Villas and the Autonomous University of Tamaulipas are pleased to invite researchers, professors, specialists and students to the Summer School on Semantic Web and Data Streams. It must be developed in conjunction with the International Workshop on Semantic Web to be held in Cuba, in June 2022. The objective of this summer school is to train skills in semantic web and the management of Stream Data. A postgraduate certificate will be issued to students of the school. The training will be 4 sessions combining theory and practice.


ADMISSION APPLICATION PROCESS


The summer school has an admission process in which applicants must submit a document via email. It will be a page where they declare why they want to participate in the course. The total number of places in the school is for thirty students.

Sending email: amed@uclv.edu.cu , dgalvez@uclv.edu.cu

Important dates:

Cuban students:

School application 05/30/2022

School Acceptance 06/04/2022

Foreign students:

School application 05/17/2022

Acceptance in school 05/20/2022


COURSES

• Descriptions Logics

• OWL and RDF languages

• SPARQL Queries

• Interoperability

• StreamData

• Artificial Intelligence techniques for stream data analysis


TEACHERS

A body of teachers and experts will serve as facilitators and teachers in the summer school:


• Ph.D. Boris Villazon Terrazas

• Ph.D. Victor Saquicela

• Ph.D. Daniel Galvez Lio

• Ph.D. Carlos Morell Perez

• Ph.D. Yusniel Hidalgo Delgado

• Ph.D. Amed Leiva Mederos

• Ph.D. Ferdinand Ortiz

• Ph.D. Ghislayne Atming

• Ph.D. Jose Emilio Labra Gallo

• Ph.D. Hector Gonzalez Diez


REGISTRATION

Nationals $3,000 CUP

Nationals online $1,800 CUP


International $70 USD
International online $50 USD
